mapper.select: select A.id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, is_top, type, A.create_time as create_time, category_name as category_name, tag_name from t_article A left join t_category C on a.category_id = c.id left join t_article_tag T on article_id = A.id left join t_tag tt on T.tag_id = tt.id where status in (1,2) order by A.create_time desc limit #{start},#{limit}
select count(1) from t_article where status in (1,2)
mapper.update: update t_article set is_top = #{isTop} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, article_cover, article_title, SUBSTR(article_content, 1, 20) as article_content, create_time from t_article where is_hot = '1'

select a.id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, category_name, tag_name, type, a.create_time, a.update_time, original_url, tur.nickname from t_article a left join t_user_info tur on a.user_id = tur.id left join t_category c on category_id = c.id left join t_article_tag tat on a.id = tat.article_id left join t_tag tt on tat.tag_id = tt.id where status in (1,2) order by A.create_time desc limit #{start},#{limit}
